posts.post_content: Don't know too much about these but they caught my eye. If anyone has a Detroit player available please shoot me a note. Thanks

Hello Nate, good luck with your quest.  There are some out there but they are few and far between.

Your most likely option for a Detroit cabinet would be a 19th century cabinet of a Detroit Wolverine, 1881-1888.

Options include:
N173 Old Judge cabinets
Tomlinson Cabinets - Portraits & Action Poses, also large format team pics
And several others such as . . .
  - Gray Studio or Fearnaught's Studio proofs for Goodwin & Co.
  - Police Gazette
  - Etc.
